# Segment Container

## Usage:

```html
<p-segment-container>
    <p-segment-item>Item 1</p-segment-item>
    <p-segment-item>Item 2</p-segment-item>
    <p-segment-item>Item 3</p-segment-item>
</p-segment-container>
```
